name: Heartbeat (jonasmv)
description:
Controls:
Walking Left: A
Walking Right: D
Jump: Space

This game is about a small robot that has not heartbeat and wants to find it. It contains 5 level with increasing difficulties. 
It is made for The 30th Godot Wild Jam:
https://itch.io/jam/godot-wild-jam-30

The code is done by Jonas M. Vejlin and is under the GPL License

The artwork is done by Kenney and is under Creative Commons Zero, CC0 license
The background is from https://kenney.nl/assets/background-elements-redux
The rest is from  https://kenney.nl/assets/simplified-platformer-pack
